sn22.8:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano rupam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:1.6: Tassa tam rupam viparinamati annatha hoti.
sn22.8:1.11: vinnanam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:1.12: Tassa tam vinnanam viparinamati annatha hoti.
sn22.8:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako rupam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:2.3: Tassa tam rupam viparinamati annatha hoti.
sn22.8:2.8: vinnanam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:2.9: Tassa tam vinnanam viparinamati annatha hoti.
